price: Hakika hii ndiyo haki yenye yakini.
footnotes: Hakika haya yaliyo tajwa katika Sura hii tukufu bila ya shaka ni kiini cha yakini iliyo thibiti, isiyo ingiliwa na shaka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
